biotools.summary: ASPEX is a set of programs for performing multipoint exclusion mapping of affected sibling pair data for discrete traits.There are five main analysis programs: sib_ibd, sib_phase, sib_map, sib_tdt, and sib_kin.

bioschemas.name: ASPEX
bioschemas.summary: ASPEX is a set of programs for performing multipoint exclusion mapping of affected sibling pair data for discrete traits.There are five main analysis programs: sib_ibd, sib_phase, sib_map, sib_tdt, and sib_kin.
